function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"High death toll, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Improved testing, tracing, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Rapid test kits, contact tracing apps, vaccine development","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare response","Impact":"Delayed diagnosis, treatment, and containment","Mitigation":"Investment in digital health technologies, improved healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence, big data, rapid sanitation methods","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"}]}
